short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Email finder for business emails ➔ More Engagement ➔ More Revenue

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily discover the verified business email address and phone number 
for any of over 900 million LinkedIn professionals worldwide

LeadLeaper email finder includes FREE monthly email discovery credits 
and UNLIMITED export credits so you are free to export your leads anytime

Customers include NETFLIX, ZOOM, Amazon, Salesforce and many 1000s more

LeadLeaper recommends LinkedIn - the world's largest and most accurate source for 
new leads. LeadLeaper supports both LinkedIn Premium and LinkedIn Sales Navigator 
with LinkedIn Sales Navigator the most popular with LeadLeaper users due to its 
greater reach, advanced search filters and greater access to LinkedIn InMail

LeadLeaper email finder does NOT copy your LinkedIn professional connections

LeadLeaper email finder does NOT modify the appearance or the functional 
behavior of your LinkedIn account

LeadLeaper email finder includes FREE:
    ✔️ Email discovery credits
    ✔️ Duplicate leads detection
    ✔️ Email sequences / campaigns 
    ✔️ Unrestricted email recipients
    ✔️ Unlimited follow-up emails
    ✔️ No daily sender limits
    ✔️ Email open tracking
    ✔️ Email templates
    
More Leads ➔ More Engagements ➔ More Revenue $$$

Have Questions?  
    ➔ Discover more at: https://leadleaper.com
    ➔ Contact our support team anytime at: contact@leadleaper.com 
    ➔ View our FAQ's at: https://leadleaper.com/leadleaper-faq.html
    ➔ View our privacy policy at: https://leadleaper.com/privacy.html

Creating a Free LeadLeaper Email Finder Account:
After adding the LeadLeaper email finder extension, you will be asked to create a free LeadLeaper account by either "Signing In" employing your Google account (in which case Google manages your login including your password) or by creating a LeadLeaper LinkedIn email finder login by providing a name (any name will do), a valid email address and a password
